Package decoworld.model.world.combat

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasClick
    Created by Samuco on 13/09/14.
    HasCollision
    Objects that need to know when a WorldItem collides with them should implement this interface.
    HasCombat
    Objects that have health and need to be damaged or healed should implement this interface.
    HasExperience
    Experience is presented as a positive value (double).
    HasHealth
    Objects that have health should implement this interface.
    HasMouseOver
    Created by wangyufei on 14-9-20.
    HealthEffect Deprecated
    - Use StatEffect instead
    Projectile  
    WorldController
    A non completed interface for objects that control decoworld.model (model) and decoworld.gdxmodel (view).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Damage
    Represents a generic mutable damage effect.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WorldControllerType
    An enum containing the different types of world controller.
